description: CMD-OS 1.3.0 (CMD for OpenStack) is an update of the Cloud Middleware Distribution targeted for use with OpenStack. It includes updates for CentOS7 and Ubuntu.
releaseNotes: This release contains the following products and updates for CentOS7 and Ubuntu: <br><ul><li>APEL-SSM 2.3.0 - improvements, see <a href="https://github.com/apel/ssm/blob/dev/CHANGELOG">https://github.com/apel/ssm/blob/dev/CHANGELOG</a></li><li>cloud-info-provider 0.12.0 - improvements and bug fixes <a href="https://github.com/EGI-Foundation/cloud-info-provider/releases/tag/0.12.0">https://github.com/EGI-Foundation/cloud-info-provider/releases/tag/0.12.0</a></li><li>cASO 1.4.0 - fix for negative values duration bug, plus other fixes and improvements <a href="https://appdb.egi.eu/store/software/caso/releases/1.x/1.4.0/">https://appdb.egi.eu/store/software/caso/releases/1.x/1.4.0/</a><br></li></ul><br>Only on CentOS7: <br><ul><li>APEL 1.8.1 - added option to update benchmarks/spec levels using a local configuration option rather than the BDII</li></ul>
installationNotes: All products in CMD-OS 1.3.0 were verified against EGI's current Quality Criteria. Installation and configuration notes are available in the EGI repository.
contact: For further information about the distribution, its goals and surrounding processes, and more information about how to engage as a Technology Provider with EGI, please send an Email to: operations (at) egi.eu.
technicalContact: &nbsp;For any bugs and issues you encounter that are not described in the release notes of this release, or the related documentation provided by the Technology Providers, please visit the EGI Helpdesk (https://ggus.eu/) to make a report.
changeLog: This release adds APEL-SSM 2.3.0, cloud-infoprovider 0.12.0, cASO 1.4.0 for CentOS7 and Ubuntu. Also this includes APEL client 1.8.1 for CentOS7 only.

products.name: apel.apel-ssm
products.description: Secure Stomp Messenger (SSM) is designed to simply send messages using the STOMP protocol. Messages are signed and may be encrypted during transit. Persistent queues should be used to guarantee delivery.
products.releaseNotes: Added a delay when receiver is reconnecting to improve reliability. Improved the log output for SSM receivers so that there are fewer trivial entries and so it's more useful in tracking messages on the filesystem.

products.name: apel.apel
products.description: The APEL project provides grid accounting for EGI. It is written in Python and uses MySQL.

products.name: ifca.caso
products.description: cASO is a pluggable extractor of Cloud Accounting Usage Records from an OpenStack installation. cASO gets usage information from nova or ceilometer APIs and can generate valid output for Apel SSM or logstash.

products.name: infoprovider.cloud-info-provider
products.description: GLUE2 BDII info provider for cloud services
